desc_corta: Help Snail Bob to find the way in each level of this adventure game with puzzles
desc_larga:
Meet Bob - a positive little snail on a mission who badly needs your help. 
Help him overcome all cunning levels filled with mind-bending puzzles and witty tricks! Find and collect the hidden stars to complete a fun collection of sculptures and paintings. 
Can you guess who our lovely mollusk imitates? Crossing the short levels in this brain game, you will appear in various stories, each chapter with a new setting. To enjoy these offline games no wifi is needed, just head on!

CHAPTER 1. HOMECOMING
Start your snail run with a construction site. Poor Bob's house was destroyed, and he has to find a new shelter. Will you help him escape the dangers and create a new Bob world in this app? The snail run won't be easy, you'll have to use your wits! Pull the levers, use the construction equipment, roll the stone balls to push the hard-to-reach buttons. During your adventure, you will meet Hunter Hamster at times. Interact with him and pass the levels easier.

CHAPTER 2. GRANDPA'S BIRTHDAY
Grandpa has always been so kind to Bob, and now Bob wants to congratulate him on his birthday with a lovely gift! In this snail mail entertainment, you are expected to guide the animal through dangerous wildlife and help him avoid all the pitfalls as he's crossing the forest. Your new friend won't sit still, and you need to keep an eye on him! Use portals, raise the bridges, and solve the puzzles on the way not to let bean fall. Watch out for the caterpillars and the UFO. Blow the balloons to rise in the air and pass over the obstacles. Hide from the Eagle but let the Woodpecker help the little shelly animal. Crossing the forest, your little friend will even appear at gunpoint of Hunter Hamster! You see, there's so much to do on this level!
Where's my water? It's just under the bridges where squids are and taking away the gift. Don't let it do that. Play that level again till you get the snail through!

CHAPTER 3. THE NILE MILE
The third chapter of this interactive fun will take you and your new friend, Bob, to ancient Egypt without a drop of water! There are so many obstructions to go through here! The Egyptian ants will block your way; the light will go off and leave you in darkness at some points. You'll need to hide from the sandstorm and escape from Anubis.
However, Egyptian frogs, the flying carpet, and Genie from the lamp will help this small shelly animal crossing obstacles. The old mummy magician snail is the last to fight. Use his power against him and complete the chapter of this brain game with a victory!

OFFLINE GAMES
Feeling ready for new adventures in these offline games? Then download the Snail Bob, tap Run Game, and enjoy level games for free! If you prefer free games without wifi or internet, Bob the Snail is a wonderful choice! It promises such warm emotions for players! You will feel kindness toward the small mollusk animal and will find it one of the best entertainment games! 

A LONG-AWAITED FREE VERSION
From Hunter Hamster Studio, the creators of remarkable series of games including Snail Bob: Love Story, Forest and Space Story, Island Story, Egypt Story, Winter and Fantasy Story, we are happy to present to your judgment the highly anticipated Android version. Snail Bob is among the most enticing fun games! Yet, you needn't be a Squid Game skilled player to enjoy the Bob free games and mini-games. Your snail ride will be pleasant in any case!

You are going to enjoy the puzzle adventure of a little snail since it is a well known hit among games for boys, games for girls and popular animal escape games without wifi!

desc_corta: High speed bike racing thrills in the fastest moto game around
desc_larga:
Play Moto X3M bike race game and show off your motocross skills. Perform stunts and tricks while you race your motor dirt bike. Choose a hog, chopper, cycle or more as your race off road.

The thrilling much loved web game explodes onto mobile.

Moto X3M brings awesome bike racing with beautifully crafted levels straight to your mobile. So grab your motorbike, strap on your helmet and grab some airtime over obstacles to beat the clock on amazing off road circuits.

- More than 25 vehicles and bikes to unlock

- More high octane levels coming soon
- Race against the clock and beat your best in timed Levels
- Checkpoints
- Additional Level packs

Moto X3M combines fast pace flying by the seat of your pants arcade levels, with whacky fantastic contraptions such as the tank that can provide interesting puzzles. While most levels are easy, it can be very hard to master the level and beat the top time.

Show off your mad skills as you fly through loops, motor over the ocean, ride the constructed tank and rally across the desert while you chase 3 stars. 

This moto extreme game brings mayhem to your mobile as you race down hill and rev your engine to hill climb to toughest challenges on your way to success. As you race to become the greatest bike racer ever and beat your friends will you be able to handle the explosions and unique obstacles each level provides or will you crash out?

Now with an additional 5 level packs with their own unique characters.
- Drive the super fast cyber world with the robot. Can you collect all the gears?
- Trick or treat with the pumpkin on the skeleton bike in the spooky Halloween pack. 
- Collect the holiday bells with Santa rider on this snowmobile or the reindeer
- Take the crash test dummy‚Äôs car for a spin this summer in the pool party pack, can you handle the endless speed?
- Crash through the construction site project with the forklift and steamroller

Can you beat the top times and get the best score? Collect stars on each level to unlock new motorcycles and the ATV with fun wheels.

Moto X3M is a free game but contains paid content. You can unlock all the characters and bikes with Google Play Pass.

We update the game regularly with your suggestions, so leave us a review and we‚Äôll do our best to improve the game.

desc_corta: Welcome to an island full of adventure !!

SEA : Swim with dolphins and baby seals or feed a hungry octopus. Go diving to collect beautiful shells hidden in the coral! And don‚Äôt forget to visit the snorkelling hut to change your oxygen tank before it runs out!

desc_corta: Try to get the maximum value in this addicting block puzzle game!
desc_larga:
üïπÔ∏è  SWITCH TO CUBES CONTROL

Are you good at crunching the numbers? Test your spatial awareness and your arithmetic skills üßê in this a-maze-ing and highly original puzzle game where the aim is to swipe and slide the cubes around the board until you can match and merge all the numbers.

Enjoy hours of relaxing, üß† brain-teasing  entertainment in this simple but ingenious number game that combines a variety of traditional mechanics to create an awesome puzzle cocktail that‚Äôs guaranteed to have you hooked and provide a brain-training sanctuary for players of all ages. 

üî¢ CRUNCH THE NUMBERS, MASTER THE MAZE ü•π

‚óæ Manipulate the figures: Move numbered blocks around an endless array of mazes to merge identical blocks until there‚Äôs only one left. You‚Äôll need real spatial awareness skills to match the numbers with the fewest possible moves, especially as the mazes get more complex the further you progress in the game.

‚óæ No penalty for trying: Even if you go wrong, you can still keep trying until you find the right solution, with no penalty for making mistakes and the option to restart levels any number of times if you get stuck ‚Äì or skip levels that you find too taxing. There‚Äôs always another puzzle waiting.

‚óæ Easy to learn, very hard to master: Simple mechanics and clear puzzle layout make Cubes Control a game that‚Äôs easy to get into for players of all ages and abilities, while hundreds of unique levels with ever more ingenious solutions mean there‚Äôs plenty to keep even ardent puzzle aficionados entertained for hours.

‚óæ Don‚Äôt get too comfortable:  Think you‚Äôve mastered the art of cube control? There‚Äôs a whole range of different mechanics in later levels to keep you on your toes, including blocking obstacles that need to be unlocked before you can merge all the cubes and boss levels where more numbers keep appearing on different parts of the board.

‚óæ Zen simplicity:  Cubes Control may offer challenging brain-teaser fun, but its clean and elegant design, no-loss levels and satisfying haptic effects every time you merge blocks mean that playing the game is never a stressful experience. In fact, it‚Äôs a great way to sooth your brain and enjoy an immersive, relaxing puzzle experience.

üî• JOIN THE NEW BLOCK PARTY üî•

Discover a new twist on number-matching in this challenging, entertaining puzzle game. 

Download Cubes Control now to find an endless source of brain-teasing fun that‚Äôs both instantly familiar and consistently surprising.

If you‚Äôre looking for a way to fill five minutes or several hours, and a game that‚Äôs guaranteed to bring satisfaction, pleasure and relaxation whatever your age or puzzle-solving abilities, then it‚Äôs time to switch to Cubes Control.

desc_corta: Pull off the coolest trick shots to get the puck in the hole!
desc_larga:
The most satisfying skill-based, puzzle game on the App Store! With over 10 million downloads, join the millions of players who are loving Buca!

Drag back, aim and release as you try and aim your puck at the right angle to get it into the hole. Buca! This is a super-fun, simple, addictive and addicting game for boys and girls, men and women of all ages.

Sometimes it‚Äôs about getting the right angle or the right timing, but also releasing your Buca puck at the right pace. Avoid the pink walls as they will kill you, but you have three chances per level to get the ball or puck in the hole.

Glide effortlessly around satisfying curved corners to get your ball in the hole. How satisfying can you get?! Gauge the right angle and speed as you find the correct way to get the puck in the Buca hole. Oh yes! Spin round gorgeous levels with relaxing ambient music and sound FX.

As well as the standard yellow puck, you can also unlock other fun balls - a unicorn, donut, tank, pink puck, USA USA puck, psychedelic multi-coloured puck, smiley emoji puck, soccer or football puck. You choose which one you want to play Buca with!

Take your time to complete each level as it will be worth it to unlock the next set of simple, fun and addictive puzzle levels of Buca. But watch out for the pink walls! On some levels, you‚Äôve got to use a jump to get over to the other side of the puzzle. 

The green pads give you a bit of extra bounce, so do use those to get your pucks further, faster. And the game itself feels a bit like air hockey, with that smooth feeling of the puck gliding over the levels.

It really is the most satisfying fun, time-killing game you can play on your mobile smartphone. How many levels can you complete? Can you get past level 44? Will you master the Buca levels and do you have the timing right to avoid the pink walls, the moving walls

Have you got the skill to aim the puck in the hole? With hundreds of satisfying, puzzling and beautiful levels, this is the ultimate challenge! In the hole!

If you really can‚Äôt complete a level, don‚Äôt panic! You can skip a level and move onto the next puzzling, fun and satisfying Buca levels.

And as well as the Classic Buca game levels, you can also unlock a whole selection of holiday/Christmas celebration levels with Christmas-based shapes like trees, stockings, candy canes and more. Or if you are really up for a challenge, you can play the Extra/Xtra Hard Levels that really are a challenge for the real masters of Buca!

Let us know which are your favourite levels in your review and please do tell us what you‚Äôd like to see more of. And meanwhile, get it in the hole, have fun and enjoy‚Ä¶Buca!!

desc_corta: Killer Sudoku Puzzles - train your brain with this number game at any time!
desc_larga:
Enjoy the free Killer Sudoku puzzle games for both beginners and advanced Sudoku lovers! Download and start the daily challenge for free!

Thousands of killer sudoku puzzles here for you to solve. Come to play this new killer sudoku game, and train your brain. Have fun!

[New] Dark Theme. Perfect to play before bad!
[New] Color Theme. Playing games could be colorful!
[New] Casual Mode. 4*4 and 6*6 boards bring you more fun!

Killer Sudoku Free is a logical puzzle number game & brain game. To complete a puzzle, like the classic sudoku game, you can fill the grid with numbers; unlike the classic sudoku puzzle, you have to make sure that the sum of numbers in each cage (areas surrounded by the dotted lines) is equal to the number in the upper left corner of the cage.

If you are interested in playing number games or math puzzle games, this Killer Sudoku is exactly for you! If you'd ever played number games, such as Sumdoku, Sumoku, Addoku or Cross sum, come to try this one, too! It is an amazing combination of a sudoku puzzle, a KenKen and a Kakuro puzzle game.

Killer Sudoku may be a little bit harder than a classic sudoku puzzle game, no worries! We offer several balanced difficulty levels for beginners and advanced players! The game has the function to add or remove notes during gameplay. Did you make a mistake at the beginning? No worries, there are undo and hint functions! Get it back fast!

How to play:

1. Place numbers 1-9 into each grid cell exactly like in a classic Sudoku puzzle;
2. Different cages - groups of grid cells indicated by dotted lines;
3. The sum of all numbers in each cage should be equal to the number in the upper left corner;
4. The sum of all numbers of each 3x3 block, row, or column always equals 45;
5. Each cage, row, column, or 3x3 block cannot have the repeated numbers.

Features:

- Turn on the note mode to take notes like solving puzzles on a piece of paper. The memo is automatically updated while you fill in the cell.

desc_corta: The amazing 3D kart racing game. Race, collect, upgrade and win!
desc_larga:
Drive into an action-packed, surprise-filled world of off-road kart racing mayhem.  Race against a field of rival drivers, each with unique personalities and special abilities.  Build a collection of crazy powerups, like Dodgeball Frenzy, Fireball, and Oil Slick.  Unlock and upgrade a variety of cars, from dune buggies to monster trucks.  Test your skills in 6 different game modes on 15 imaginative 3D race tracks, against a pack of tropical-loving rivals with a serious case of road rage!

‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ GAME FEATURES

Utilize your driving skills and a collection of creative powerups to fight your way to the finish line.  It‚Äôs not just a great looking 3D racing game, it‚Äôs an epic battle with spectacular physics-based gameplay!

Use your winnings to collect and upgrade a garage full of unique cars, from monster trucks to muscle cars to lunar rovers!  

TONS OF AMAZING POWERUPS
Beach Buggy Racing crushes other kart racers with over 25 totally unique Powerups ... and more Powerups are coming!

15 SPECTACULAR RACE TRACKS
Explore dinosaur-infested jungles, lava-spewing volcanoes, beautiful beaches, and mysterious swamps.  Each unique race track is packed with hidden shortcuts and surprises.

COLLECT A TEAM OF RACERS
Recruit a team of drivers to play with, each with a unique special power like teleportation, flaming fire tracks, and confusion spells.  

SPLIT SCREEN MULTIPLAYER
Race shoulder-to-shoulder with up to 4 friends on Android TV, or a TV-connected phone or tablet. (Requires In-App Purchase)

GOOGLE PLAY GAME SERVICES
Compete with your friends on Leaderboards, earn Achievements, back up your game to the cloud, and keep multiple devices in sync with your Google account.

PLAY THE WAY YOU WANT
Seamlessly switch between tilt steering, touch-screen, and USB/Bluetooth gamepad.  Customize the 3D graphics settings to optimize your play experience.


‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¢ CUSTOMER SUPPORT

If you encounter a problem running the game, please email us at support@vectorunit.com.  Be sure to include the device you're using, Android OS version, and a detailed description of your problem.  

We GUARANTEE if we can't fix a purchasing problem we'll give you a refund.  But we can't help you if you just leave your problem in a review.

desc_corta: Guess the flag, country, city by photo. Geography quiz game 2024.
desc_larga:
World Quiz is a fun and educational geography quiz game that lets you explore world geography, national flags, maps, and more. It‚Äôs one of the most comprehensive geography games out there, combining elements of a world quiz, flag quiz, country quiz, and map game into one app.

Whether you‚Äôre a traveler wanting to learn geography or a trivia enthusiast, you‚Äôll find this geography quiz engaging. If you are a fan of fun geography games or challenging map games, this game has you covered with its variety of game modes. It‚Äôs like having several geography games and map games in one place! Test your knowledge of flags of the world and discover fascinating facts about our planet along the way.

Test your knowledge with quizzes on every aspect of world geography. Try to guess the country from a photo of its landscape or outline. Take the ultimate flag test and see if you can name all the flags of the world. You‚Äôll also tackle intriguing geography quiz questions ‚Äì for example, do you know which continent has no ants or where a thumbs-up gesture is a big insult? Play now to learn geography the fun way and become a true geo expert!

Game Modes:
	‚Ä¢	Guess the Country: A classic country quiz challenge. You‚Äôll see a photo or map and have to name the country in this countries quiz mode, covering all countries of the world.
	‚Ä¢	City Quiz: Travel to famous cities and capitals. Guess the city from its landmarks or map location to advance to the next destination.
	‚Ä¢	Flag Quiz: Identify national flags in a challenging quiz. This mode is the ultimate flag test of your memory of flags of the world ‚Äì from easy to hard.
	‚Ä¢	World Cuisines: Identify the country or region by its traditional dish. How well do you know world cuisine? This tasty quiz is a unique way to explore the world through food.
	‚Ä¢	Geography Trivia: Answer random questions about world geography, continents, and cultures. It‚Äôs a great way to learn geography facts you might not find in other geography games.
	‚Ä¢	Traveler‚Äôs Test: Learn about customs and traditions around the world. Answer fun questions about cultural quirks in different countries and see how much you know beyond maps and flags.

Features:
	‚Ä¢	Offline Play: The game is fully playable offline, so you can enjoy this geography quiz anywhere without an internet connection.
	‚Ä¢	Online Tournaments: Challenge other players in multiplayer quiz tournaments. Compete in global rankings and prove you‚Äôre the best at world geography.
	‚Ä¢	Regular Updates: New questions (flags, maps, etc.) are added with each update to keep the quiz fresh and fun.
	‚Ä¢	Educational & Fun: Expand your knowledge of all the countries of the world while having fun. This quiz helps you learn geography as you play.

How good are you at geography? Do you know the capitals of all European countries? Can you identify every U.S. state on a map, or name every country in Asia? With this map game and flag quiz, you can put your knowledge to the test in the ultimate countries quiz. Download World Quiz now and see if you can guess the country and get all flags of the world right!

Doodle God ‚Äî Sandbox Alchemy Puzzle Simulation Game

Doodle God is a sandbox puzzle game and simulator where players create a world by combining chemical elements. 
This God simulator focuses on direct element-merging gameplay, letting you experiment with fire, water, earth, and wind to build new items and expand your planet. Every combination functions as a structured game mechanic, keeping the experience centered on puzzle-based progression.

üéÆ Gameplay
The game begins with core elements and challenges players to merge them through controlled experiments. Each correct reaction unlocks new elements and advanced item sets. As you discover combinations, your planet updates visually, showing growth from microorganisms to animals, tools, structures, and eventually a complete universe. All actions follow clear puzzle rules to maintain consistent game logic and progression.

‚öôÔ∏è Main Features
* Pure sandbox element-combining gameplay
* Over 300 mergeable items based on alchemy
* Step-by-step puzzle sequences designed for simulation-style discovery
* Real-time visual evolution of the world and planet
* Multiple structured modes focused on gameplay systems
* Updated element encyclopedia for reference
* Optional ad-free mode
* Optimized for both phones and tablets
* Available in 13 languages

üîåGame Modes
* Planet Mode ‚Äì Watch your planet evolve as you unlock new reactions
* Mission Mode ‚Äì Goal-driven challenges emphasizing puzzle structure
* Puzzle Mode ‚Äì Build items such as locomotives, skyscrapers, and machines
* Quests ‚Äì Scenario-based gameplay that follows specific puzzle paths
* Artifact Mode ‚Äì Unlock rare creations through advanced element merges

üå¨Ô∏è‚òÄÔ∏èüíßüî•
Doodle God is designed for players who enjoy sandbox games, alchemy crafting, element puzzles, and simulation-style world building. Every action focuses on gameplay mechanics, making it a clear and consistent video game experience aimed at players who enjoy logical discovery and creative construction.

desc_corta: An easy and classic wood block puzzle game to train your brain.
desc_larga:
Easy to play but challenging puzzle game! Train your brain and improve your IQ!

Wood block puzzle is a beautiful combination of Sudoku and block game. Wood Block Puzzle is also a kind of Tetris game with classic and woody skin. More wood blocks crush, more score you will get. Try it and you will love this Board Game!

Match blocks to complete lines and cubes to get them removed. Keep the board clean and beat your high score in a block puzzle! Challenge mode is similar to jigsaw. It helps expand your mind and carry it to a new and high level!

There are two interesting gameplay designs in the game. When you can display any blocks onto the board, don't forget to use coins to rotate blocks or drag one block to the area called Holder for later use. Making full use of the coins and holders can help your brain to stay flexible.


How to be a master of Wood Block Puzzle?
1. Drag and drop wood block onto 10x10 grid board.
2. Eliminate blocks by creating full rows and columns.
3. Reward scores for each move and every row or column of blocks eliminated.
4. When you get stuck, try to use rotation props or remove blocks into the Holder.
5. Game will be over if there is no room on the board for given blocks.

Wood block puzzle features:
1. Immersive gameplay with no time limit.
2. Play the game at any place such as in a caf√© or in a queue.
3. Auto save game progress for you to continue next time.
4.NO time limits, play block puzzle at your own pace!
5. Many special shapes of blocks make the game full of challenges.
6. Holder can restore one block which can not be displayed on the board.
7. Rotation props can change the direction of blocks for you to fit the board.
8. The woody style graphic leads you to nature.
9. Let the crisp sound effects amuse yourself.

Wood block puzzle is a classic wood puzzle game for all ages. Share Wood Block Puzzle with your friends, spend leisure time together, and get close to each other!

desc_corta: No limits. Build, destroy, and rebuild the city exactly how you want.
desc_larga:
BUILD YOUR OWN CITY IN A DETAILED CITY SIMULATION
Step into a city building game focused on freedom, scale, and long-term development. TheoTown lets you build a city from scratch‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs a small town, a growing metropolis, or something entirely your own. Inspired by classic city builders, TheoTown combines intuitive tools with deep simulation systems. From towering skyscrapers to simple residential blocks, every part of your city is shaped by your decisions.

DESIGN CITIES WITH ZONES, ROADS, AND PUBLIC BUILDINGS üåÜ
TheoTown is about planning and experimentation. As your city grows, you decide how districts are laid out, how neighborhoods connect, and how the city evolves over time. Few city simulation games offer this level of freedom to build, change, and rebuild without artificial limits.

PLAN TRANSPORTATION & INFRASTRUCTURE üöà
A functioning city depends on movement. Build roads, highways, railways, and airports to connect different parts of your city. TheoTown challenges you to design efficient transportation networks and manage traffic flow as your city expands.

HANDLE EMERGENCIES AND KEEP THE CITY RUNNING üöí
City life isn‚Äôt always predictable. Disasters can happen, emergencies arise, and public safety must be maintained. Build fire stations, police departments, and hospitals to respond to events and keep your city operational.

BUILD LANDMARKS AND CUSTOMIZE YOUR WORLD üåç
Construct famous landmarks, unique structures, and customize your game using community-made plugins. TheoTown supports a wide range of play styles, from realistic city layouts to creative and experimental designs.

THEOTOWN GAME FEATURES: - Flexible City Building ‚Äì Create anything from small towns to large megacities with detailed layouts and varied architecture. - Transportation Systems ‚Äì Build and connect roads, railways, and airports; manage trains, buses, and planes. - Emergencies & Events ‚Äì Deal with fires, natural disasters, crime, and other city challenges. - Famous Landmarks ‚Äì Build well-known structures such as Big Ben, the Eiffel Tower, and the Statue of Liberty. - User-Made Plugins ‚Äì Expand the game with community-created buildings and features. - Sports Facilities ‚Äì Build stadiums that add character and activity to your city. - Energy Systems ‚Äì Power your city using different energy sources, from traditional plants to advanced solutions. - Public Services ‚Äì Establish police stations, fire departments, and hospitals. - Open-Ended Gameplay ‚Äì Unlock new content as your city grows, with long-term simulation depth. - Community & Sharing ‚Äì Take screenshots of your cities and explore creations made by other players.

TheoTown is made for fans of city simulation, urban planning, and thoughtful building games. Take your time, experiment, and shape a city that grows in its own way.

üëâDownload and play TheoTown free and offline!

OVERVIEW
BADLAND is an award-winning atmospheric side-scrolling action adventure platformer set in a gorgeous forest full of various inhabitants, trees and flowers. Although the forest appears to be right out of a beautiful fairy tale, there‚Äôs something terribly wrong. The player controls one of the forest dwellers to find out what‚Äôs going on, and discovers an astonishing number of imaginative traps and obstacles on the way. 

BADLAND takes side-scrollers to the next level with its innovative physics-based gameplay combined with stunning, atmospheric graphics and audio. 

BADLAND also features a highly original local multiplayer mode for up to four players on the same device, where the name of the game is survival of the fittest with no rules. It‚Äôs totally OK to push your rivals in front of spinning circular saws to survive. Or, if that's too rough for you, you can also cooperate with your friends and play the modified single player campaign with up to four players.

Become the ultimate villain in Summoner's Greed, the addictive idle tower defense RPG where you play the bad guy! Unlike other idle RPG titles or generic clicker games, Summoner's Greed combines the tactical depth of tower defense with easy-to-learn auto battle mechanics. Whether you are AFK or actively playing, your monsters fight to protect your gold!

GAME FEATURES

üè∞ Master Idle Tower Defense Strategy Place your towers strategically to wipe out waves of attacking knights, mages, and heroes. As a TD game fan, you‚Äôll love analyzing enemy paths and optimizing your monster placement for maximum damage.

üêâ Summon & Collect Legendary Monsters Why play a hero when you can be a monster? Summon rare beasts, epic slimes, and legendary demons to join your squad. Upgrade your creatures to unlock powerful evolution forms and dominate the battlefield.

‚öîÔ∏è Endless RPG Progression Level up your monsters, upgrade skills, and cast powerful spells. Experience deep RPG elements with skill trees, elemental synergies (Fire, Ice, Lightning), and mythical upgrades.

üí§ Offline Idle Rewards Busy? No problem! Your monster army keeps fighting even when you are offline. Earn gold, collect resources, and return to upgrade your defenses in this true offline idle game.

üî• Epic Boss Battles Challenge the King‚Äôs elite bosses! Use your wits and strategy to defeat massive foes and earn rare rewards.

Why play Summoner's Greed?

HIGHLIGHTS of Block Puzzle Fish

- Easy & Addictive Gameplay
It is authentic to the classic puzzle gameplay and totally FREE without a time limit for you when you play. You will definitely love the puzzles and cute creatures after your first try.	 


HOW TO PLAY Block Puzzle Fish 

- Drag and drop shapes on the 10√ó10 grid board
- Fit the position and make 10 blocks fill in a line to eliminate them

- Get as many scores and combos as you can to get great rewards or bonus


You can also share this creative block puzzle game with your friends or family members, and enjoy leisure time together with them! Don't hesitate to download for FREE NOW!

desc_corta: Escape from the tower in this indie offline adventure!
desc_larga:
Take your princess to freedom in this roguelike adventure! Make your way down the tower, fight mighty enemies and beat the dragon! 


Once Upon a Tower is a medieval roguelike offline game perfect for those looking to live an epic adventure. Plan your escape and take your princess to freedom with the help of your sharp skills and a set of epic features in this unique indie offline game.

Ever wanted to escape somewhere else? Ever felt like you were trapped in a high tower,  just like a princess? Ever found yourself waiting for a valiant knight to come and save you?

Wait no more! Cause the knight isn't coming -- No, really, he isn't. He was literally eaten by that guardian dragon over there.

You have all you need to escape and set yourself free in this adventure. The brave knight left his hammer behind, I'm sure you can put it to good use, right? So, grab it and get yourself to the bottom of the tower, like the strong princess you are! 

Make your way to the bottom of the tower in this downward indie action game with a roguelike twist, where each princess is strong enough to make it on its own, without the help of any knight.

You can beat the enemies. You can escape the dragon. YOU CAN DO THIS! Now let the adventure begin, once upon a tower.

What is in it for you in this offline indie adventure?

- Enemies that get harder and nastier as you descend.
- A roguelike structure where every adventure is different: if you fail you have to start over again from the top of the castle.
- Different princesses to free from the tower!  
- Different power-ups to make your princesses stronger.
- Tons of action!

Now, bend the rules of fairy tales, Once Upon a Tower is waiting for you!

desc_larga:
Discover the wonderful world of style and fashion and feel like a real designer in the new Bella Fashion Design game for free. Create a chain of fashion boutiques and make your mark in this wonderful business. In various mini games, there will be exquisite accessories, elegant dresses and luxurious jewelry. And your boutiques will be visited by fashion-conscious girls and boys of all types, from ordinary people to real celebrities. And each of them has their own character, style, tastes and preferences. It won't be easy to please them all, but the challenge will be captivating!

Despite being a simple country girl, Bella dreams about the world of fashion. She wants to be a famous designer. She decides to open her first fashion boutique right on her uncle‚Äôs ranch. Bella begins her way to success in a small shop with poor choice of handmade dresses for girls, but they are definitely in style. As you help her out by providing service to customers and assisting them in selecting clothes and accessories, the fashion business gradually takes off. Happy fashionistas like shopping and pay well, and soon you will be able to purchase additional equipment for the boutique, more exquisite clothes, luxury jewelry and trendy accessories. Everything is bright and iridescent like a unicorn!
The gameplay of Bella Fashion Design is based on well-known principles of the time management genre. You must quickly react to certain events to drive the game forward: help customers with shopping, choose a certain outfit, show them new dresses, lead them to a fitting room and finally accept their money. If a VIP person comes to the boutique, you must put their best foot forward in giving him or her top of the line service to receive good tips as a result.

- A variety of mini games
- 6 boutiques where your business will grow and flourish
- A house to fit out to your own taste
- Stunning graphics

titulo_original: Town Building Games: Tropic City Construction Game
desc_corta: Escape to a tropical island bay and build the village of your dreams!
desc_larga:
For city building lovers: Escape to a tropical island bay and build the town village of your dreams!

A new city building construction simulator game is on its way to your device. Do you like tycoon-style building games that offer you literally infinite options in how you create and design your city life? Then this new citybuilder game is exactly what you are looking for. It is based on the City Island 2 - Building Sim city building game but with a fresh new interaction design and a complete new way to collect your cash. Now there is always something to do and always cash to collect!

Starting with simple houses that grow into huge skyscrapers and skylines, this game will test your management planning and organizational skills. Lay out parks, streets, entertainment, and employment areas. Don't forget to provide basic city services like electricity, sanitation, and police and fire protection. Your citizens will be thankful and more productive the happier you make them in their custom environment. 

Beautiful graphics are a key part of this exciting new "tap" game based on City Island 2. Lovely renderings of buildings, shops, and stadiums await you once you begin. The more you grow your city, the more decorative and detailed each building becomes. As you invest in amenities, your town city becomes more and more like the dream community you imagined and grows to become a real metropolis.

This is the kind of town building game that teaches as you play, increasing your knowledge of city planning, resource management, and the services required to make a city run. It offers real world rules on how your citizens interact with your developments. Custom options allow you to set up your city the way you see fit, and it allows you to change your gaming experience as you adjust to new challenges. 

Be sure to keep your citizens happy, or you won't generate the revenues you need to build the city of your dreams. Much like in the real world, citizen satisfaction is key to success if you want to be a tycoon of this city builder. Different environments and dozens of different buildings will help drive that happiness. The more you play, the more secrets you will discover about your city and how it works.

Don't feel limited by real world design. There are thousands of options in how you want to build your city in this free offline construction game. You will be able to play both on and off line. Free to play, anyone can get started. Micropayments for special upgrades and building will be available, but not required.

Download this new game today, and build the town of your dreams in this city construction game.

desc_corta: Pack a case and head to the airport!
desc_larga:
Time to go on a trip!! Pack a case and head to the airport! Go through security and board the plane after shopping in duty free!! Jump in the swimming pool ‚Ä¶ Holiday time is here !!


Yasa Pets Vacation is totally FREE to play !! 


Features include:


* Find a case and pack it for the trip !!
* Jump in the taxi and head for the airport !!
* Choose a destination and buy tickets for everyone !! 
* Weigh the cases and make sure they are not too heavy !
* Buy more luggage and stock up on medicines and face masks !!
* Watch the planes land and enjoy a coffee while waiting for the flight !
* After check-in go through security and passport control !
* There are lots of things to buy in the Duty Free shops !!
* Board the plane and take your seat !
* Arrive at the holiday villa and relax in the sunshine !!
* Play in pool then have a cooling ice-cream !
* Come home happy and ready to plan a new trip !!


**** Remember to connect to the internet to collect the stars ****


HOME : Get ready for an exciting trip by packing new holiday outfits and favourite items! Find more cases in the garage to pack extra stuff. Make sure the kids and the babies are ready to go, then jump in the taxi and head to the airport. 


AIRPORT ARRIVALS : Make sure that everyone has their ticket and passport ready! Weigh the cases and bags to make sure that they are not to heavy! Drop off the luggage and check-in for the flight !! 


AIRPORT SECURITY :Check hand luggage for sharp items and liquids, then put them through the scanner ! Go through the metal detector and join the line for passport control !


AIRPORT SHOPPING : One of the best things about airports is all the shopping choices that you can find. Duty Free is full of plush toys, tasty candy and fashionable outfits!! Pick up some medicine or a face mask in the pharmacy and don‚Äôt forget the extra cases at the luggage shop !


AIRPORT DINING : Sometimes passengers have to wait for long times between flights ‚Ä¶ luckily there are lots of places to grab a tasty snack! You can find coffee shops with comfy sofas and great views of the planes before and after security !! Or have some delicious sushi with other passengers before getting on the plane!


PLANE : Show your ticket and passport to the security officer at the gate!! Once on board, find your seat and put your hand luggage in the overhead compartment. The pilot might come by to say hello before we take off !!


HOLIDAY VILLA : The sun is shining at the beautiful villa overlooking the sea. Put on a swimming costume and jump in the pool !! Celebrate the summer at an ice-cream party with family and friends under the sun !!


***

desc_larga:
The game is still under active development. We carefully read all your comments and feedback to make sure every new update counts. Thanks for your support!

Jurassic Monster World: Dinosaur War 3D FPS is a mobile game like you've never seen before. Battle metal-plated monster dinos in a post-apocalyptic world! A synchronized 5x5 PvP free-to-play action shooter with different modes! Control beasts on land or in the sky, fully mechanized, augmented or organic: the choice is yours!

Gameplay: 

Unique setting! 
A harsh new world where only the strongest survive!
Game mechanics variety 
Chew through enemies in melee attacks or strike from a distance, sabotage on the sly or hurl headlong into battle!
Tons of different creatures
Metal, organic or augmented: take your pick! 

Land and air battles
Sky battle fans rejoice! We've got flying dinos and more. Pick your battleground!
A wealth of weapons
Equip your dino with any weapon you want, from traditional guns to next-gen energy blasters!

The game has 3 main dino types, including: 

1. Full Metal ‚Äì AI machines devoid of any biological tissue and mercy. Specially equipped with an energy shield against weapons from the old world.
Tyrannosaurus is at the top of the metal jungle food chain. He can jump from place to place with super speed and stun several enemies at once. Deadly in melee battles. One false move and the enemy is toast.

2. Organic ‚Äì Life is evolving in round 2 upon the ruins of the destroyed old world. Now monsters from the Jurassic Era are out to kill, not to live.
Spinosaurus is an insatiable hunter killer. Dino butchers preying on lesser animals, spinosauri can hold their own in melee battle and against enemies with superior strength. Their jumps give them unmatched mobility, and their mighty roar can stun a whole group of enemies, leaving them open to deadly attacks.

3. Augmented ‚Äì On the border of human and machine, they are the best of both worlds. Human intellect mixed with advanced tech form a deadly combination.
Triceratops ‚Äì You don't want to get in his way when he's charging. Triceratops are always on the hunt for their next victim. Their razor sharp horns are tough to dodge in melee battle, and these beasts can even restore their own health if they need to.  

Jurassic Monster World: Dinosaur War 3D FPS is free to download and play, but some in-game elements are available for purchase. The game requires a stable internet connection. Mobile internet will do, but Wi-Fi is best.

desc_corta: Explore a fully functioning hospital full of doctors and nurses!
desc_larga:
In the hospital new moms give birth to baby bunnys and baby kittens! Visitors bring gift baskets and flowers to their loved ones. Sick patients arrive in the ambulance and have X-Rays and take medicine.

Yasa Pets Hospital is totally FREE to play !! 


Features include:

* Explore a fully functioning hospital full of doctors and nurses!
* Take a number and wait for your appointment in the waiting room!
* Register at the reception when you arrive at the hospital!
* Be there when baby bunnys and kittens are born!
* Treat patients who arrive in the ambulance!
* Run tests in the laboratory to diagnose illnesses!
* Make bunnys and kittens sick by giving them the green bottles to drink!
* Visit the Pharmacy to get the correct medications!
* Perform x-rays on patients and put them in casts!
* Give pregnant bunnys and kittys ultrasound exams!
* Buy presents and flowers in the gift shop!
* Have dinner in the restaurant with staff and visitors!
* Unlock the NEW BABY PARTY by collecting STARS !!!!
* Exchange gifts and have afternoon tea at the garden party!
* Introduce the baby kittens and bunnys to their new home and put them to bed.


**** Remember to connect to the internet to collect the stars ****

RECEPTION : Patients must check in at the reception and then wait for their number to be called before they are given a checkup in the doctor‚Äôs office. Some patients then go upstairs to private rooms on the different wards where they are looked after and given tasty meals!

TOP FLOOR : This is where baby bunnys and baby kittens are born! It‚Äôs so important for pregnant mamas to get regular check ups! An ultrasound exam is a great way to make sure that everyone is healthy!  Friends and family can visit and see the newborn babies sleeping in the nursery!!

SECOND FLOOR : This is the section of the hospital where patients recover from falls and broken bones. The X-Ray machine can let the doctors know how bad an injury is and the cast machine provides the bandages needed to get better! 

EMERGENCY ROOM: Patients who are brought to the hospital in the ambulance need urgent care in the emergency room. Doctors and nurses are always ready for these high priority patients and often give surgery.

MEDICAL LAB : When patients are sick the scientists in the laboratory test samples to find out what is wrong with them. They can also make special medicines which are available in the pharmacy for patients who need them.

PHARMACY : The hospital pharmacy has all the medicines needed to cure any patient who is not well. But be careful ‚Ä¶ the green bottles might make the bunnys and kittens sick all over again !!

VISITORS RESTAURANT : Friends and family of patients need something nice to eat after a long visit with their loved ones ‚Ä¶  luckily there is a restaurant serving warm tasty meals! Visitors can choose between pizza, roast chicken or fish with lots of healthy vegetables and delicious cup cakes for desert!

GIFT SHOP : Everyone likes to get presents - especially when they‚Äôre not feeling well! The hospital gift shop is filled with toys, gift baskets and beautiful bouquets of flowers. Don‚Äôt forget to include a get well card!

HOSPITAL STAFF AREA : Tired doctors and nurses have a rest area where they can relax and have snacks after a busy day helping patients.

HOME : The new parents celebrate the birth of their adorable babies with a garden party for all of their family and friends. Everyone brings presents and enjoys tea and cakes in the garden before it is time to wash the new babies and put them to sleep in their cribs!‚Ä®

***

desc_corta:
TAP! DIG! MY MUSEUM!
Have fun excavating fossils and create your own museum!
desc_larga:
Have fun excavating fossils and create your own museum!

One day, I was entrusted with a disused museum. I discover dinosaur fossils and enjoy putting them together piece by piece.
I'm glad to see an increasing amount of surprised and happy visitors. 
Looks like this will be a fantastic museum! 


(How to play)

- Create an exhibition stand.
Create an exhibition stand to display your fossils.
Gradually restore and develop the run down museum.

- Set out to excavate fossils.
Discover fossils to display in the exhibition stand. You can choose your dig site from the map. Enjoy wondering about what kind of dinosaur fossil you will unearth!
Please the visitors to the museum by collecting and assembling every part of the fossils.

- Raise your level.
Raise the level of your museum. Eventually you will receive many visitors. 
Raise the level of your character. You can increase the number of excavations. 
Raise the level of your pickaxe. This widens the range of rocks that you can destroy.  

- Collect fossils.
You can collect your fossils in the storehouse and install your preferred fossils wherever you like. 
(However, some fossils cannot be displayed depending on the type of exhibition stand.)

- Earn money.
Visitors will pay to come and see your fossils. 
The amount of money they spend will vary depending on the type of customer and their satisfaction level (based on the state of your fossil collection.)
With the money you earn you can fund excavations, make exhibition stands, and level up. 


Enjoy a fun museum management game with puzzle-like fossil excavations and simple controls! You will always be excitedly anticipating your next fossil discovery! 
Collect many fossils, and aim to create your own wonderful museum with cute pixel art characters that move around!

desc_corta: Immerse yourself in the fantasy world of augmented reality!
desc_larga:
Go and catch your own monster collection: winged horses, cool vampires, unicorns, and other fun magical creatures. If your online adventure proves successful, you‚Äôll ultimately be able to tame even the superior beasts ‚Äì Elemental Dragons!

If you‚Äôre looking for the best mobile dragon games to play, this is exactly what you need! Go and find an adventure or an epic quest in this free-to-play mobile game. 

Draconius GO is a popular free mobile game in AR that will spark your interest more than any other popular GPS game.

Have you ever dreamed of catching mighty dragons?

Can you picture yourself taming a dragon? It might be a huge dragon or a small drake ‚Äì no one knows! All of the creatures in the game evolve and change, so it‚Äôs up to you to decide whether your pet will be a cute little creature, a frightening monster, or something completely new. The game offers you a collection of more than 200 interesting creatures, each of which can evolve.

No other popular dragon game can make you this addicted! Go outside, find a cool egg, hatch it, and discover a monster inside. You never know who will hatch from the mysterious egg. Evolve and upgrade your mighty dragon to become the best monster and fight your enemies online! 

Enjoy the various quests to keep your adventure fresh and exciting.

Regular quests allow you to find scrolls for new spells and start your fascinating search for the Golden Egg!

Portals to the AR world of Arcana unlock a new element of creatures and help you find the path to the Mother of Dragons. Only she can hatch a cool ancient egg in augmented reality.

Most spells become unlocked after your character reaches level 5. You‚Äôll be able to enhance your creatures or throw other players out of the arena by using the most powerful spells, together with your best friends!

After reaching level 5, you will be able to fight other people in duels. But you‚Äôll need to catch up and make sure you‚Äôre well prepared.

The Ancient Libraries will allow you to change and upgrade your creatures‚Äô skills, but before you can do that, you‚Äôll have to fight the opposite faction.

Fight mighty wild monsters online at all times! The winner will get the best runes for cool spells you can cast. Complete your collection by finding a rare dragon or some other pocket monsters.

Discover all the treasure chests in AR. If you‚Äôre lucky enough, you might find in them interesting artifacts unlocking new options for your character.

Just a game or healthy lifestyle?

GPS navigation and an interactive map allow you to meet new people, explore your city, and see it in a whole new light. The ordinary places you‚Äôve walked through a thousand times will now hold magical and wondrous secrets. 

People on the streets might be your enemies! This free game will make you go outside and enjoy the outdoors! Take a liking to it, have fun, and interact with your friends a lot more, which is far more exciting than going to the gym.

What to play it on?

You can play our game for free online on your favorite mobile device, but you‚Äôll need a mobile phone or tablet with Android 5.1 or later.

Download Draconius GO now to go on an exciting adventure in augmented reality! Take your interest in one of the best free dragon games online!

desc_corta: Interactive pets at your fingertips!
desc_larga:
‚òÜ‚òÖ‚òÜCute! Fun! Social!‚òÜ‚òÖ‚òÜ

Do you love animals but can‚Äôt adopt your own?

Do you want a friendly companion by your side?

Or do you just love adorable animals?

Then Hellopet‚Äôs for you! Using screen overlay technology, you can have cats, dogs and more cute animals running around your home screen. Or visit My Room to create a fun home for your pets!
Unlock new pets, items, and rooms by collecting or buying cookies! Collect hearts by clearing the I'm Hungry! Mini game! Share your creations in Pet Chat, visit friends‚Äô rooms and leave messages in their Guestbook. Your pet will keep you updated on missed texts, the time, your battery level and much more!

‚ô•ADOPT‚ô•
- When you download Hellopet, choose your first cat or dog for free
- Now you can adopt pets by participating in our newly added Daily Check-in and Pet Chance Event
- Also you can adopt pets by using cookies, purchasing cookies in the Cookie Store, etc.

‚ô•COMMUNITY- PET CHAT‚ô•
- Share funny moments with your pets
- Ask questions about Hellopet to friends
- Pet Chat Gallery mode lets you see the best Pet Chat snaps
- Find new friends
- Share fan art pictures, links, and your favourite Pet Chat posts 

‚ô•The Mini Game - I'm Hungry!‚ô•
- The I‚Äôm Hungry! Game is a challenging puzzle where users feed pets by clearing a level
- Score points for matching 4 or more of the same snack
- Clear levels and receive hearts
- A Wild pet appears on players‚Äô home screen if they clear 5 levels

‚ô•MY ROOM‚ô•
- Decorate My Room with a variety of items that your pets can interact with (wallpaper, flooring, furniture, pet supplies, and more with each update!)
- Feed and use to toys to play with pets
- Take a picture, save, and share your decorated My Room

‚ô•COLLECT HEARTS‚ô•
- Hearts appear above your pets‚Äô heads as you play, feed, and tap your pet
- Get hearts when you decorate My Room, interactive with pets

‚ô•HOMESCREEN‚ô•
- Take pets out from My Room, and they freely run, talk, and play on your screen
- Interact with pets by using Voice Commands and tap ‚Äò!‚Äô speech bubbles when they appear
- Pets‚Äô responses change with your daily mobile habits
- Pets give up to date weather, time, and battery alerts

‚ô•SOCIAL‚ô•
- Send ‚ÄòHello‚Äô messages to Hellopet friends and your pet will briefly visit their home screen
- Send a pet‚Äôs picture with a short message to friends without Hellopet through almost any messenger.

**Join the Hellopet community on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram for events & more**
*FB: https://www.facebook.com/HellopetGlobal
*TW: @hellopet_global
*Insta: @hellopet_global

‚ô•Hellopet Permissions Information‚ô•
Below are the permissions which are necessary in order to operate the Hellopet app. 
Users can use Hellopet without enabling optional permissions.

‚Ä¢Storage(Required): Download update files, saved images, My Room screenshots, and save Pet Chat photos 
‚Ä¢Microphone(Optional): Enables voice commands for your pets
‚Ä¢Contacts(Optional): Enables voice commands to make calls and write SMS messages
‚Ä¢Device ID(Optional): Enables app to recognize ads opened and give rewards

‚ô•Managing permissions‚ô•
Android versions 6.0 and later: Settings> Application Manager> Hellopet> App Permissions> Allow access
Android versions prior to 6.0: Will be required to update to version 6.0 to access the permissions menu

desc_corta: Let's explore princess castle. a dollhouse game adventure with little princess.
desc_larga:
Jibi Land Princess Castle is a pretend-play dollhouse game that features an open-ended style of play. This allows you to explore a world filled with magic and fantasy. In this magical land, you will find numerous surprises and meet amazing characters such as little princesses, charming princes, dragons, unicorns, fairy, and many other cute pets. If you are a fan of dollhouses, this is a game you won't want to miss.

This is the first game in the Jibi Land series with a Princess Castle theme.

Inside the princess' castle, you'll find lots of activities to do, whether it's exploring the castle, solving puzzles, hunting treasure, or dressing up the princess. Make up and go out on a date with the prince, then cook delicious food and drinks. Come to a party at the private pool or enjoy with lots of cute pets, including cats, dogs, horses, and go in search of the little unicorn in the mysterious land. All in all, you can choose to play freely. There are no rules; anything is possible in this land, depending on your imagination.

How to play:
Our gameplay is like pretend play or a dollhouse. There are no rules to play. Our game is an independent space that allows children to fully unleash their imagination. Just choose a favorite character, like my princess, and use your imagination to create your own story

What will the story in this castle be like next?
You decide.

Game features:
- 9 fantastic dollhouse scenes, with tons of secrets and treasure puzzles to surprise you in this magic castle.
- Many cute characters, such as little princess, handsome prince, king, queen, maid, and chef, letting you create your own story freely.
- More than 100 animal characters for you to raise and take care of, such as little unicorn, little fairy, mischievous cat, and cute dog.
- Many gorgeous princess dresses to let you dress up the princess.
- Dragon eggs and unicorn eggs waiting for you to find and hatch.
- Some pets can grow, such as horse, unicorn, dragon. Take care of them and watch them grow.
- More than 100 food and beverage menus for you to cook. Let's cook delicious food for my princess.
- A magic magnifying glass system that will help you find secret items and solve puzzles.
- Sticker system for you to find and collect over 100 types.

New update:
- The underground secret room : encounter over 50 mysterious fairy, and discover ancient hidden treasures waiting to be found.
- New map system : Allows you to roam the world freely, explore new locations, and embark on adventures in the magic world of Jibi Land.

Advice for parents:
This game is designed for children between the ages of 6-12, so they can be played by themselves or with friends. Children under 6 years of age should be accompanied by a parent.

We believe in the power of pretend play, as it will help develop children's imagination and creativity. So we strive to develop an independent space in the format of a dollhouse where children can play and enjoy using their imagination. And we would appreciate it if parents can take the time to join this game with your child. Because that means our games can play a part in building a good relationship within your family. 

We hope you enjoy playing this game.

desc_corta: Drive fast 8 super cars in the most Realistic Driving Simulator of 2025!
desc_larga:
Furious Car Driving 2025 is an advanced driving simulator with realistic physics for both sport and an off-road car.

There are 8 furious cars that are fully controllable and you can modify front and rear suspensions, camber, suspensions spring force and damp.

You can turn on or off the steering assistances such as ABS (Anti-lock Braking System), ESP (Electronic Stability Program), TCS (Traction Control System) and SH (Steering Helper).

You can also adjust the Maximum Speed, Maximum Brake and Maximum Torque of each super fast car!

Choose the traction type that you like: front wheel drive (FWD),  rear wheel drive (RWD) or all-wheel-drive (AWD) and take the cars off-road for an excitement ride. An off-road car for driving on hills and to simulate 4x4 traction. 

You can call this game an extreme car simulator or extreme furious car driving and you won't be wrong. Choose what kind of transmission you like: manual or auto.

Get on the highway and use the nitro to drive as fast and as furious as you can in 8 super cars! Enjoy the advanced physics engine with incredible physics behaviour and graphics. 

Drive with your car in different styles including drift mode that enables the car to drift using the hand break. All vehicles driving game means you can drive a Bus, a Van, a Truck with trailer or without a trailer, a desert buggy, a SUV or a Sedan. Furious car racing is a great way to spend some time gaming and driving a super car.

If you like car driving games with cars that crush, get damage and amazing drifting try this car driving simulator game! Race fast, drive Furious! Looking for new car games in 2025? Try this car game and you will have endless hours of fun by driving different types of vehicles!

Top Features

desc_corta: Combine kitty cat species to create kitten pets in this idle clicker evolution
desc_larga:
Welcome to the wonderful world of cats! In Cat Evolution, you get to experience life from a feline perspective. You`ll be able to merge cats in this animal evolution idle game. Every time you do a cat merge, you will discover a new species of cat! I mean, if you love cats, you will definitely be happy to find out that there are several different species in the Cat Evolution Clicker Game. üòπ
 
To merge your cats in these kitty cat games, you'll need to match two cats of the same breed and level. Once you merge animals, the two cats will combine to create a new, more powerful cat merge. You can continue to merge cats to create even more powerful felines, unlocking new cat merge possibilities! You will be so excited to see your animal evolve. 
 
üò∏ Merge Animals ‚Äì Evolution Games
Cat Evolution is the cat game for those who simply love evolution games. You just need to drag to cats with the same species to merge cats into a new, different, mysterious kitty. 
 
Cat Evolution brings and introduces several new species! From the simplest to the strongest and most stunning. Discover species like Catoon, Foxitten, Meowne and many more! Can you discover them all? 
 
Merge cats to create even more powerful felines, unlocking new abilities and traits along the way. Every kitty has the ability to produce a certain number of coins per second and the more advanced they are, the more coins you will have per second, speeding up how your animal evolve.
 
But this is much more than an animal evolution and mutation game, it's a game with an incredible and surprising story, with cute kittens in doodle-style illustration, where you need to form as many mutations as possible and also find the imposters!
 
The Imposters
To play evolution games, you need to focus in the light of the show, the kitties. You'll have to be careful to find all the imposters and prevent them from disguising themselves among your kittens! For every imposter you spot, you'll earn a bonus coin. You need to watch out and pay attention!
 
üò∏ The Cat Game ‚Äì Clicker Idle Game 
Overall, this cat merge animal evolution is an idle clicker game, with exciting and engaging ways to collect and combine adorable cats, even when you're not actively playing. These kitty cat games allow you to keep progressing just by being the best clicker ever. You just keep clicking frantically to acquire more cats and thus get more and more coins or more cats for you to combine and cause the animal evolution!
 
Whether you're a kitty lover or just love playing idle games, the cat game is sure to provide hours of entertainment and fun. So get ready to collect, merge, and evolve your way to the top of the kitty cat game kingdom!
 
This evolution game is free to play but contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extra items mentioned in the description can also be purchased for real money.

desc_corta: The latest and most interesting rhythm piano game.
desc_larga:
Rhythm Piano Music Tiles 2
The Perfect Fusion of Music and Challenge

I. Core Gameplay
Rhythm Piano Music Tiles 2 is a rhythm-based offline game where players tap descending black tiles onto the judgment line in sync with the music to complete combos. With minimalist visuals and dynamic soundtracks, the game transforms musical rhythm into fingertip thrills. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned rhythm gamer, you'll discover tailored challenges in its progressively layered beats.

II. Diverse Music and Visual Spectacle
Featuring a vast library of songs spanning classical piano, pop hits, EDM, and indie tracks, each track is paired with a unique visual theme‚Äîfrom celestial keyboard light trails to cyberpunk neon stages. Synchronized audio-visual experiences immerse players in concert-like atmospheres. Iconic melodies like Canon in D and Twinkle Twinkle Little Star deliver fresh, innovative performances.

III. Precision Controls and Advanced Techniques
While the mechanics seem simple, mastery requires skill. Players must master combo timing, long-press swipes, and multi-tap sequences to conquer complex high-difficulty charts. Rapid-fire tiles test hand speed limits, while sudden "acceleration segments" challenge mental resilience. Compete globally through daily challenges and real-time multiplayer battles against up to 4 players.

IV. Personalized Experience and Social Interaction
The game supports custom music uploads, allowing players to convert local tracks into personalized soundtracks. Share these with friends via the community hub. Built-in modes like Master Mode offer endless combo challenges, while Co-op Mode enables duo play for high-difficulty duets. The AI-powered Rhythm Classroom analyzes player performance, providing targeted training advice to transform novices into rhythm masters.

V. Technological Innovation and Immersive Experience
Powered by advanced touch feedback technology, Rhythm Piano Music Tiles 2 achieves millisecond-level responsiveness, enhanced by vibration feedback and stereo sound effects that replicate real piano key sensations. A dynamic difficulty system adjusts chart intensity in real time, balancing fluidity and challenge. Offline mode ensures instant access, letting players enjoy musical healing during fragmented moments.

VI. Game Features:
 ¬∑ Simple graphics, intuitive controls‚Äîeveryone can play piano!
 ¬∑ Breathtaking rhythms that push hand-speed limits.
 ¬∑ Online multiplayer battles with up to 4 players on-screen.
 ¬∑ Share records with friends and compete globally via leaderboards.
 ¬∑ High-quality sound design for concert-like immersion.
 ¬∑ Progressive challenges with great rewards to boost self-improvement.

Conclusion
Rhythm Piano Music Tiles 2 transcends traditional rhythm games‚Äîit's a bridge connecting players to art. Through precise rhythm control, diverse music, and innovative gameplay design, it redefines the possibilities of rhythm gaming. Whether you're chasing high scores or seeking musical relaxation, this game lets you find your unique rhythm through fingertip motion.

Download now and embark on your piano conquest journey!

desc_corta: A fast strategy game that puts you in the celestial shoes of a jealous god.

desc_corta: Railroad crossing game. Adjust the car traffic and help cross road
Play with squishy clusters of soap bubbles in this award-winning puzzle game.
desc_larga:
Winner of over a dozen gaming awards. Play with squishy clusters of soap bubbles in this mesmerizing puzzle game. Inflate, mix, match, pop, and win with hundreds of goals to complete. Starts easy, then gets more and more challenging.

NOTE: An in-app purchase is available that removes ads between puzzles. It also unlocks Dark Graphics Mode and 2 additional Worlds with 50 hard puzzles.

INNOVATIVE NEW GAMEPLAY
Fill bubbles with colorful air and push nearby bubbles around using the physics of real bubbles! Break edges between bubbles to mix new colors and create matches of 4 or more. Plan your strategy from a list of moves to build up cascading chain reactions for dazzling bonuses.

HOURS OF AMAZING CONTENT
Experience unique surprises down every path! Each of the over 170 handmade puzzles requires new thinking and twisting strategies with ever increasing challenges. Play in 3 different game modes: PUZZLES, ARCADE, and INFINITY. Try to beat 35 bubbly achievements that will give your brain a workout.

LIFE-LIKE SOAP BUBBLE PHYSICS
From the vision of artist/coder/designer Stu Denman and inspired by the work of his MIT scientist grandfather, the game brings the beauty of nature to your screen. Incredibly fluid ‚Äúmolecular dynamics engine‚Äù animates hundreds of bubbles at 60 FPS.

RELAXING AND ATMOSPHERIC
Relaxing ambient music gracefully integrates with the satisfying sounds of popping bubbles. Put on a pair of headphones and experience a new level of flow and mindfulness. Play Infinity mode to earn helpful hint tickets.

CHARMING CREATURES
Help tiny aquatic creatures that are trapped in the bubbles. Avoid greedy jelly crabs and spiky urchins. Love him or hate him, a curious fish named Bloop will surely reveal your nature as an optimist or a pessimist.

COLOR-BLIND MODE
Featuring an innovative color-blind mode that provides an authentic and accessible game experience without intrusive icons or patterns.

------ AWARDS ------
‚óè Winner, Best Mobile Game, Gamer's Voice Award at SXSW
‚óè Winner, Best Quickplay, 14th International Mobile Gaming Awards
‚óè Winner, Google Indie Games Festival
‚óè Grand Prize Winner, The Label's Indie Showdown
‚óè Official Selection, The PAX 10, Penny Arcade Expo West
‚óè Winner, Amazon Games Forum Showdown
‚óè Winner, Seattle Indie Game Competition
‚óè Winner, Best Overall Game, Intel Buzz Workshop
‚óè Official Selection, Indie Megabooth, PAX West
‚óè Official Selection, Made With Unity Showcase
‚óè Finalist, Intel Level Up
‚óè Finalist, Best Gameplay, AzPlay, Spain

desc_corta: Burn up the tables in this fast-moving pinball game!

üïπÔ∏è CLASSIC ARCADE ENTERTAINMENT üïπÔ∏è

Looking for some old school arcade fun on your device? Go back to where it all began with the true great grandaddy of all arcade games ‚Äì pinball! ü§©  Download Pinball ‚Äì Smash Arcade now and get ready to flip your way through hundreds of uniquely designed playfields with a whole host of exciting and original game mechanics that bring the classic arcade experience to life right on your device.

üéØ ON YOUR MARKS, GET SET, FLIP! 

‚òÖ Flip out: Pinball ‚Äì Smash Arcade offers hundreds of levels, each with its own individually designed playfield, that will keep you playing all the angles and constantly adjusting your tactics to dodge and weave through an increasingly complicated set of obstacles and barriers.

‚òÖ A numbers game: To complete one level and unlock the next, you‚Äôll need to break open the padlock at the top of the game by raising the score on your ball to the same number that‚Äôs on the lock. Build up the biggest score you can on your ball by bouncing it off bumpers and kickers, then slam it into the target to lower the number to zero ‚Äì bullseye, you‚Äôre on to the next level.

‚òÖ Endless variations: In Pinball, you‚Äôll find levels that feature just about every mechanism that‚Äôs ever graced a pinball table, including slingshots, gates, switches, portals, and a whole lot more that ensures an action-packed game every time you play.

‚òÖ Turn the tables: If you‚Äôre stuck on a really tricky level, there‚Äôs a range of different boosters you can use to help you reach the target, including triple balls, a points doubler, and many more. Unlock new boosters as you progress through levels for even more exciting gameplay on the tables.

‚òÖ Crystal clear: Pick up crystals from the table as you play and use them not only to buy in-level boosters, but also to visit the shop where you can personalize the pinball table and balls, with a range of different designs to unlock.

‚òÖ A great side gig! As well as regular classic tables, you can also stock up on larger numbers of crystals by playing crazy bonus levels where the rewards are great and the gameplay‚Äôs particularly wild.

‚òÖ Haptastic: Carefully designed sound and haptic effects give your device the feel of a real pinball table, making the playing experience of this classic arcade game even more immersive.

desc_corta: The Bananarchy is over!

‚Ä¢         The holy grail of this very lofty quest: an infinite mode to show who‚Äôs boss! This is where you want to score! Who‚Äôs the King of the kings!?
‚Ä¢         The game is 100% playable offline, so you can play it wherever and whenever you want.

The game gives you a lot of freedom to create your own kingdom. With days and days of offline gameplay fun.
Make your townsmen happy and build nice decoration to beautify your town. Or grow food for your cute monsters and see them grow. This game can be played at your own speed and all the way YOU want it.

Choose from far over 200 different buildings! Explore 36 different zones and play through over 300 quests.

Your father has left you a heritage, a rundown castle with some land.
Now it is up to you to rebuilt your former empire to its old strength.
On the way you receive help from your father's old friend Charles and some skewed characters, humans & monsters!
Throughout a variety of quests you gather experience and expand your land and village.

ABOUT THE GAME :
Two poor young people, born and raised in a favela in Rio de Janeiro, not having much chance of success in the future, where most of them work until they die and continue in difficulty and poverty, some manage to change their reality by studying and getting rich, others end up becoming football players and many choose the "easy" way into the life of crime.

These young people were best friends, however when they were both 18 years old, they chose different paths, one became a great football player and won the title of Inside Soccer (title given to extremely outstanding players), in this game you will discover and decide which one it will be the future of the other (David).

In a heavy ravine and a city with corrupt politicians and police exploiting the population, with high unemployment and abandoned health education, our young man only had two ways out, to go to war with crime or against it, he needed money to help your family and get them out of the favela abandoned by the authorities.
